Comments.Message: Warlock isn't being maintained and appears to be using some out-of-date code paths.  I'm sorry, I don't think there's anything I can do to help you unless we get a Warlock developer who can reprogram the module.

Well I already fixed this issues by myself, but still I don't have the developer status and can't commit my changes :-(

As soon as I become a member of the dev-team I will commit my changes to TFS to solve this issues inside the Warlock library.
